mainPage.AboutText: My last place of work was WAVES company, I worked there as a Middle+ Frontend Developer. My role was to create a new website functionality and support it, and I also did a code review of my colleagues. Initially I was working on a swop.fi project on the WAVES blockchain. The turnover of the project was $ 10 million and more than 100,000 users, who accounted for 25% of all transactions on the blockchain. After a year of work, it was decided to create a new project axly.io so for the last six months I have been working on 2 projects in parallel. axly.io launched in August 2023. Unfortunately, the current crisis is very difficult for the WAVES blockchain and a lot of teams have been disbanded, including mine.
mainPage.WavesDescription: During my time at this company, I completely rewrote the old site code (with the exception of some pages), created new pages and components, and also wrote 2 sites from scratch, axly.io on next.js and app.axly.io react.js. During the last 9 months in this team, the second frontend developer was transferred to a neighboring team and work on all the projects of our team was entirely on me.

mainPage.SwopfiDescription: Swop.fi is a service for instant cryptocurrency exchange and earning passive income through cryptocurrency investments. Swop.fi is built on the Waves blockchain, which ensures low network fees and high transaction speed.
mainPage.AxlyDescription: Axly is a next-level DeFi protocol that combines the capabilities of AMM liquidity pools and a credit platform to maximize capital efficiency. Axly offers users two main ways to earn: liquidity farming with leverage and depositing a single asset to earn interest on targeted loans.
mainPage.HivexDescription: At the start of my work in this company, I helped create an internal CRM system, after six months of work, junior developers were added to my responsibilities with their tasks, to some extent I was in the role of team leader.
